EligibilityInstructions.title: Instructions
EligibilityInstructions.description: Please answer the following questions related to your Water Licence Application.

AnswerOnJob_eligible.title: Are you eligible to apply for a water licence?
AnswerOnJob_eligible.description:
If you answer yes to any ONE of the questions below, select the 'Yes' option.

- Are you the owner of land or a mine in British Columbia where the water will be used?
- Are you entitled to possession of land or a mine in British Columbia where the water will be used?
- Do you have a substantial interest in the land, mine, or an undertaking in British Columbia where the water will be used?
- Are you a holder of a certificate of public convenience and necessity issued under the Public Utilities Act, the Utilities Commission Act or the Water Utility Act?
- Are you a municipality, regional district, improvement district, development district or water users' community?
- Are you representing the government of British Columbia or Canada?
- Are you representing a commission, board or person having charge of the administration of Crown land or a mine or an undertaking on Crown land, administered by British Columbia or Canada or controlled by a ministry, department, branch or other subdivision of the government of British Columbia or Canada?
- Are you representing the Greater Vancouver Water District or any other water district incorporated by an Act?
- Are you representing the British Columbia Hydro and Power Authority?
- Are you applying as an agent on behalf of an eligible applicant as described above?

AnswerOnJob_housing.title: Is this application in relation to increasing the supply of housing units within British Columbia?
AnswerOnJob_housing.description: A Housing related project, for the purpose of this application, must be for a specific development and the development must increase the number of housing units on the land/property.

AnswerOnJob_north-coast-line.title: Is this application related to the North Coast Transmission Line?

AnswerOnJob_bc-hydro-sustainability.title: Is this application related to a BC Hydro Sustainment Project required for the maintenance and upgrading of existing electricity infrastructure, such as replacing aging equipment, improving transmission systems, or reinforcing substations to support long-term energy needs?

AnswerOnJob_clean-energy.title: Is this application related to a clean energy project that received a new Energy Purchase Agreement from BC Hydro between 2024-present?
